import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text, Center } from "@chakra-ui/layout"; import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image"; import { Button } from "@chakra-ui/button"; import NavGoNFT from "../components/NavGoNFT"; import '../CSS/GoNFT.css'; import ArrowDown from "../images/Vector.png"; import GoFundImg from "../images/GoFundNft.png"; import Conquistafa from "../images/01.png"; import EngajaFideliza from "../images/02.png"; import NovasOportunidades from "../images/03.png"; import Monetiza from "../images/04.png"; import Captacao from "../images/05.png"; import Inovaçao from "../images/06.png"; import digitaçao from "../images/07.png"; export default function GoFNT() { const evento = document.querySelector("#evento"); evento?.addEventListener("mouseover",function(){ const legenda = document.querySelector("#legenda"); legenda?.classList.remove("hide"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseout",function(){ const legenda = document.querySelector("#legenda"); legenda?.classList.add("hide"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseover",function(){ const Primeiralegenda = document.querySelector("#Primeiralegenda"); Primeiralegenda?.classList.add("hidetxt"); }) evento?.addEventListener("mouseout",function(){ const Primeiralegenda = document.querySelector("#Primeiralegenda"); Primeiralegenda?.classList.remove("hidetxt"); }) return ( APRESENTANDO...
